video_prompt: A whimsical miniature amusement park in a display case. The Ferris wheel rotates, gondolas sway. Roller coaster carts ascend then speed down the track. Carousel horses gallop. Lights inside the pink house flicker. A clear "river" gently flows, reflecting the glowing scene. Snow-like elements subtly shift. The interior of the display case subtly fogs and clears.
image_prompt: Miniature whimsical amusement park inside a display case, snow and ice-themed with cool blue, purple, and pink lighting. Features: large Ferris wheel with blue/pink gondolas, purple roller coaster with orange carts, white carousel with horse figures, illuminated pink candy-like house, pastel trees, light blue river, and colorful gummy-like forms in snow. Frosty atmosphere, white display case. Magical winter wonderland funfair.
refined_video_prompt: Ferris wheel rotates, its gondolas swaying. Roller coaster carts ascend then speed down the track. Carousel horses gallop. Lights in the pink house flicker. A clear river gently flows, reflecting the glowing scene. Snow-like elements subtly shift. The display case interior subtly fogs and clears.
